summary: A reworking of Natterforme's Ordinator Armor to look more akin to the Morrowind version.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]CREDIT GOES TO MCMUFFIN FOR HIS ORDINATOR ARMOR, AND TO NATTERFORME FOR PORTING IT TO SKYRIM. [/size]

[size=2]Adds "Indoril Armor" Basically just McMuffin's Ordinator Armor, but truer to the original Morrowind design. 

It may not look world's apart from McMuffin's design, but there are noticeable differences. I gave more saturation to the textures, placed original Indoril armor textures over, and removed the sash on the front. 

You can find the armor on top of Refugee's Rest near Windhelm. 

Textures are from Morrowind so they're obviously not going to be drop-dead gorgeous. 

You do not have to download Natterforme's mod before this. Everything is there. 

[/size]We're watching you. Scum.
author: NaziPunk434
